oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-05-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 28, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Billy Walker (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1077th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Archie Campbell; Marty Robbins; Lonzo & Oscar; Del Wood; Billy Walker; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Marty Robbins) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- I Lost An Angel (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Tiger Rag (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Billy Walker announce his tour schedule -- I'll Be True To You (Billy Walker, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Billy Walker) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Lonzo and Oscar; Robbins, Marty
